title: Basic Module Learning for Motorcycle Engine Repair

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of mechanical components and proficiency in using simple tools
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric learning environment utilizing practice videos and images

learning_goals: Learners can explain the names and functions of major motorcycle engine components.
Learners can execute basic inspection procedures (oil check, spark plug inspection, etc.) step-by-step.
Learners can connect common malfunction symptoms (cold start failure, overheating, etc.) with their corresponding solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
